summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 21st Avenue Northeast, from the alley between Naomi Place (now East 62nd Street) and East 63rd Street, to East 61st Street, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 83265, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
